reference_a:
@article{fried2022,
  title = {Mental health and social contact during the {{COVID-19}} pandemic: An ecological momentary assessment study},
  shorttitle = {Mental health and social contact during the {{COVID-19}} pandemic},
  author = {Fried, Eiko I. and Papanikolaou, Faidra and Epskamp, Sacha},
  date = {2022-03-01},
  journaltitle = {Clinical Psychological Science},
  volume = {10},
  number = {2},
  pages = {340--354},
  publisher = {SAGE Publications Inc},
  doi = {10.1177/21677026211017839}
}
additional_comments: some individuals have more than the maximum number of observations due to some prompts being expired

features.name: difficulties_relaxing
features.coding:
I found it difficult to relax.
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly
features.details: I found it difficult to relax.
features.labels:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly
features.construct: relaxation, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five, psychopathology

features.name: social_offline
features.coding:
I spent ___ minutes on meaningful, offline, social interaction
1 = 0 minutes
2 = 5-15 min
3 = 15-60 min
4 = 1-2 hours
5 = > 2h
features.details: I spent ___ minutes on meaningful, offline, social interaction
features.construct: offline social interaction, social interaction, activity, context

features.name: social_online
features.coding:
I spent __ minutes using social media to kill/pass the time

2 = 5-15 min
3 = 15-60 min
4 = 1-2 hours
5 = > 2h
features.details: I spent __ minutes using social media to kill/pass the time
features.construct: online social interaction, social interaction, activity, context
